member.name: T:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ComponentManifest
member.summary:
Component manifests contains a human-created short metadata about a top-level functional component in an assembly.
A component is 'something of interest for a user' a tool, an app (or significant part of it), a plugin etc.

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ComponentManifest.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the component

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ComponentManifest.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the short description of the component.

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ComponentManifest.DocumentationUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the component documentation URI.

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ComponentManifest.Tags
member.summary: Gets or sets the tags that should allow for a component to be found in a repository catalog.

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ComponentManifest.Properties
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional key-value properties associated with a component. These properties might be enriched by a transmitter plugin automatically (e.g. if a transmitter plugin uses reflection to scan through code for some extra info)

member.name: T:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ProjectInfo
member.summary:
Project info contains data about a project, understood as a class library or an executable.
Projects can contain zero or more components They can contain a set of plugins, tool or functionalities, however they can only be helper assemblies which do not contain any high-level components (in which case they are not interesting from the point of view of repository catalog).
Project info is also different from a component manifest in that a project properties are automatically extracted from the project file (e.g. csproj), whereas component manifests are intended as a human-to-human communication

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ProjectInfo.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier.

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ProjectInfo.AddedDateTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the date time of when the info was added to the database

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ProjectInfo.ProjectName
member.summary: The name of the project (e.g. the name of the csproj file)

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ProjectInfo.Autogenerated
member.summary: Set to true if the project info was generated automatically, without a human-created manifest file

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ProjectInfo.Owner
member.summary: Who maintains the project at the moment

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ProjectInfo.ProjectDescription
member.summary: A description of problem

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ProjectInfo.ProjectUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the project URI.

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ProjectInfo.DownloadLocation
member.summary: Gets a location from which the file should be downloadable. The location should be accessible to user (if not the RepoCat webapp). Either URL or file path

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ProjectInfo.AssemblyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the assembly generated by this project

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ProjectInfo.OutputType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the project output (class library, windows app etc)

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ProjectInfo.TargetExtension
member.summary: Gets or sets the target extension.

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ProjectInfo.RepositoryId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the repository in which the project lives

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ProjectInfo.RepositoryStamp
member.summary: A datetime or version stamp of the repository as of when the project info was read and transmitted

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ProjectInfo.Tags
member.summary: Gets or sets the tags that should allow for a project to be found in a repository catalog. These are properties applicable to entire project, not specific components

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ProjectInfo.Properties
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional key-value properties associated with a project. These properties might be enriched by a transmitter plugin automatically (e.g. if a transmitter plugin uses reflection to scan through code for some extra info)

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.ProjectInfo.Components
member.summary: Gets or sets the components manifests

member.name: T:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.RepositoryInfo
member.summary: Info about repository

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.RepositoryInfo.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier.

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.RepositoryInfo.RepositoryName
member.summary: Name of the repository

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.RepositoryInfo.OrganizationName
member.summary: Name of the organization owning the repository

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.RepositoryInfo.RepositoryMode
member.summary: Mode of project storage in the repository

member.name: T:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.RepositoryMode
member.summary: Specifies how the repository data should be collected.

member.name: F:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.RepositoryMode.Default
member.summary:
In default mode, when a project info is transmitted to RepoCat, it will look for this project in the database
and update the existing entity - or create one if not found

member.name: F:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.RepositoryMode.Snapshot
member.summary:
Snapshot mode is for when entire repository (multiple projects & components) is built at the same time, having the same repository stamp.
In this mode, every time projects are transmitted, they are created as new entities under a given repository stamp
This way RepoCat can present a current and previous snapshots of a repository, rather than all projects that are currently or used to be in it.

member.name: T:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.CollectionSummary
member.summary: Summary info about a collection

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.CollectionSummary.CollectionNamespace
member.summary: Name

member.name: T:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.Project
member.summary:
Project component which contains a reference to it's repository and project details.
It does not correspond to a specific database collection.
It is assembled by performing a join during a query.

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.Project.ProjectInfo
member.summary: Details about the project

member.name: P:RepoCat.Persistence.Models.Project.RepositoryInfo
member.summary: Repository reference
